attributes.action: We require the house of Lords to pass the Brexit Bill.
attributes.additional_details: We require the house of Lords to abide by the house of commons and the will of the people to pass the Brexit Bill.
attributes.background: We require the house of Lords to abide by the house of commons and the will of the people to pass the Brexit Bill.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about matters that the Government or the House of Commons are responsible for. We can't accept petitions calling on the House of Lords to take action.
